Hi all,

As much as I had hoped that this story would work out, it's become=

pretty clear to me that it's not.  At least not for me.  Between not
knowi=
ng what's going and not being responded to, I feel like an
unneeded fish ou=
t of water - or maybe an unneeded BW fan in a
predominantly Transformers RP=
.  Not your guys' fault that I don't know
my Transformers, nor is it your f=
ault that I had other expectations. 
However, as a suggestion I wouldn't ma=
ke it a habit of letting posts
go blatantly ignored for so long, especially=
 when it comes to
newcomers who don't know what the heck they're doing ;)

=
Feel free to write out Shard, or kill him off.  I'll just delete my
Maul po=
st since it went unanswered and won't be missed. 

I'd like to thank Cyclon=
us for his help; I wouldn't have even made it
this far without him, and I e=
njoyed the interaction with Myrmidon
while it lasted.  :)  Good luck to you=
 all!
